presentation.title: Engineering, Development & Innovation
presentation.subtitle: Transforming ideas into code that shapes reality

aboutMe.title: Hello! I'm Paulo Eduardo.
aboutMe.subtitle: Computer Scientist and Software Engineer.
aboutMe.biography: I have been a computing enthusiast from a very early age. My first contact with a computer occurred when I was 7 years old, and since then, I knew this would be my future. It was during my undergraduate studies in Computer Science that I deeply immersed myself in the fascinating world of programming, significantly expanding my knowledge and skills. Today, my days are filled with lines of code and a constant pursuit of knowledge. I am passionate about developing applications and systems that positively impact people's lives and business efficiency.

qualities.title: Mid-level Developer
qualities.description: With over 6 years of studying computing and 4 years working as a developer, I strive every day to be a better professional than I was yesterday.

qualities.title: Clean Code
qualities.description: During development, code quality is the most important guideline. I am always seeking to learn and follow best practices from literature.

qualities.title: Agile Methodologies
qualities.description: I use methodologies and planning that optimize my production workflow. Using development methodologies makes processes fast and efficient.

qualities.title: Critical Thinking
qualities.description: I always seek to add value by analyzing problems and proposing viable, efficient solutions. I have a facility for solving logical challenges.

experiences.title: Computer Science
experiences.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Piauí - UFPI.

experiences.title: Scientific Research
experiences.description: Research in the area of Elastic Optical Networks. The study results were presented at the XXXIX Brazilian Symposium on Computer Networks.

experiences.title: Ponto Sistemas Web Solutions
experiences.description: Development of a real-time web system for customs inspections. Using technologies such as Vue 2, SASS, and Spring Boot.

experiences.title: IndeCX
experiences.description: Development of a multinational B2B satisfaction survey platform. Using technologies such as Vue 3, Node.js, and MongoDB.
